definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to fight/to scuffle/to come to blows/CL:場|场[chang2]
to quarrel/to have a row/quarrel/CL:頓|顿[dun4]

sentences.english: Do you decide to buy a cat scratcher or cat climber?
sentences.chinese: 您有，或者想过要买一个猫爬架吗？

sentences.english: Airbus delivered 18 of its A380 superjumbo last year.
sentences.chinese: 空中客车交付18架其A380超巨型飞机去年。

sentences.english: Still got that Derringer in your bustle?
sentences.chinese: 架仍旧还有那根支撑条吗？

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.
sentences.chinese: 砸毁了阿根廷的5架“超级军旗”攻击机。

sentences.english: On Thursday only 168 flights passed through Gatwick.
sentences.chinese: 周四，只有168架航班通过盖特维克机场。

sentences.english: We  have restaurant-style metal shelves in our closet.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的衣柜里有餐厅式金属架。

sentences.english: New Boat 600 aircraft has now been 16 domestic and international orders.
sentences.chinese: 新舟600飞机现已获得国际国内订单16架。

sentences.english: Put your cups in the basin please.
His lawyer said Underwood had gone to see his girlfriend and wanted to finish a domestic argument.
sentences.chinese: 他的律师替他辩护道，他是去找女友了，想把架吵完。

sentences.english: Seems to me the desire here is a semi stealthly fighter bomber that is affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来这是架廉价的半隐形战斗轰炸机。

sentences.english: Spot ALL the barbecue skewers AND cuffs.
sentences.chinese: 找出所有的烧烤架和手铐。

sentences.english: The thirty - six Enterprise dive-bomber were being squandered in a jittery shot from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 这三十六架“企业号”上的俯冲轰炸机正被孤注一掷。

sentences.english: The presence of rough surfaces or ledges make the room difficult to clean.
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的表面或壁架的存在使房间很难清理。

sentences.english: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
sentences.chinese: 哈西拿的子孙建立鱼门，架横梁，安门扇，和闩锁。

sentences.english: Put a small table with a drawer underneath it.
sentences.chinese: 在钥匙架下面放一个带抽屉的小桌子。
